com.p2plib2.common

Class CommonFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.p2plib2.common.CommonFunctions

  • public class CommonFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for normalizing operator name and checks permissions*

    • Method Detail

      • permissionCheck

        public static void permissionCheck(android.content.Context cnt,
                                   android.app.Activity act)
        The function for asking all required permissions. There are CALL_PHONE, READ_SMS, SEND_SMS, READ_PHONE_STATE, RECEIVE_SMS, BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE, MODIFY_PHONE_STATE. Display permissions dialog with request code 200 TODO: input - list of requirements, output - permission dialog for them

      • operName

        public static java.lang.String operName(android.content.Context cnt)
        Returns:
        default telephone operator in normal format

      • formatOperMame

        public static java.lang.String formatOperMame(java.lang.String oName)
        Parameters:
        oName - - String param, which may contains operator name in different styles
        Returns:
        operator name in Uppercase without additional text, such as "Rus 1" and etc. Work with operator names, which contains "MTS", "BEELINE", "MEGAFON", "TELE" TODO: in input rules for normalizing operators and ability to add new operator or move this function in ORM
